markdownRemark.html:
It’s done, Scenarex was immortalized by the artist Jasmin Guerard Alie from La Centrale des artistes in this magnificent work of art done for Le Tiers Lieu. It’s an honour to be part of the successful entrepreneurial adventure of Marie-Anne Perreault and Jonathan Falardeau. You can watch once more the presentation of this work of art using this link:

https://www.facebook.com/letierslieu/videos/847539255424495/

frontmatter.title: Scenarex was immortalized by the artist Jasmin Guerard Alie from La Centrale des artistes
frontmatter.author: Simon-Pierre Marion
